param.name: interactionFile
param.label: The interaction data file created by chicViewpoint

param.name: targetFormat_selector
param.label: List of chromosomes or a BED file containg regions

param.name: targetFileHDF
param.label: The target data file created by chicSignificantInteractions

param.name: targetFileBED
param.label: Regions of interest
param.help: BED file which stores a list of regions that are used to aggregate the data for the differntial test.

tool.help:
Aggregate statistic for differential testing ============================================
chicAggregateStatistic is a preprocessing tool for chicDifferentialTest. It takes two consecutive viewpoint files and one target file and creates one file containing all locations which should be tested for differential interactions. Either one target file for two consecutive viewpoint files or one target file for all viewpoints is accepted.
For more information about HiCExplorer please consider our documentation on readthedocs.io_
.. _readthedocs.io: http://hicexplorer.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html
